channel.title: Permission to use Assets for Saxxies 2014
channel.description:
Hello, I'm sorry if I put this in the wrong section of the forums, but since Black Mesa was released under Creative Commons license, do I have permission to use its assets in Source Filmmaker for Valve's Saxxies 2014?
Official Saxxy Page [url]https://www.sourcefilmmaker.com/saxxyawards2014/guidelines/[/url]
My youtube page [url]https://www.youtube.com/user/kungfubellydancer[/url]
My Steam page [url]https://steamcommunity.com/id/viktorvoskov/[/url]
Thank you!

item.title: Permission to use Assets for Saxxies 2014
item.dc:creator: Joe_chief
item.description:
Man you’re videos look amazing, I can’t wait to see what you pull off for the saxies.
About time we got a good BMSFM.

Read full topic
item.source: Permission to use Assets for Saxxies 2014

item.title: Permission to use Assets for Saxxies 2014
item.dc:creator: kungfubellydancer
item.description:
Thanks guys, you are the best! Of course, the link to Black Mesa’s official page will be present on the movie’s description, and the views it will get post-saxxies will probably help to promote you guys and your project in some way.

Read full topic
item.source: Permission to use Assets for Saxxies 2014
